title: ID needed
content:
That’s a piece of custom lettering sooner but... there might be a chance to buy this as it is. Can anyone give a link? At least to the typeface that became a basis.

| --- | --- |
| [infowarroom2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234801/http:/typophile.com/files/infowarroom2.jpg) | 121.12 KB |

author: onki

comments.content:
not sure that it’s custom. Looks like straight-up Chromium One

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/chromium-one/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234801/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/chromium-one/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/chromium-one/")
thanks, man.. I had a hope and... here it is for 40 USD only =)
